interestingcomments.content:
SwatClips launched! /!/ Put tools in their place. 25 years of framing experience led us to want more, demand more. So here at SwatClips we engineered and built these tool holders to stop the "hammer slap", the missing bits, the dropped drill, and the aching back. We built these to bring tool holders into the 21st century. 100% US made, owned and operated.

[SwatClips Website!](https://www.swatclips.com/)

![video](p20d2kkis9871)
